comment._content:
Wow...
I may not be able to appreciate certain forms of abstract art, but there's definitely a limit...

This is just too ridiculous, anybody with a functioning cerebellum could do this.
God this (and the others from the collection) is so insulting for anybody who appreciates real creativity and art forms!

comment._content: I like it, especially the nostalgic white area in the center
